statements: SELECT * FROM literature_sources ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_sources WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title, publication_venue FROM literature_sources WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM literature_sources WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT title, publication_venue FROM literature_sources ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM literature_sources WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, author, publication_venue FROM literature_sources WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT author, publication_date FROM literature_sources WHERE publication_venue LIKE '%Journal%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT id, title, author, publication_venue FROM literature_sources ORDER BY author, publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(id) AS average_id FROM literature_sources WHERE publication_venue = 'Conference' GROUP BY author ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM sources WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM sources WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title, author, publication_venue FROM sources WHERE publication_venue LIKE '%Journal%';
SELECT DISTINCT publication_venue FROM sources;
SELECT * FROM sources WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM sources WHERE publication_venue = 'New York Times' AND publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;

SELECT title, publication_venue, location FROM sources INNER JOIN publication_venues ON sources.publication_venue = publication_venues.venue_name WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM sources WHERE title LIKE '%AI%' ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sources WHERE publication_date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT title, author FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, title, publication_venue FROM publications WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_venue IN (SELECT id FROM publication_venues WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York');
SELECT id, title, author FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE author = 'John Smith' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS publication_count FROM publications GROUP BY author HAVING publication_count > 1 ORDER BY publication_count DESC;

SELECT title, publication_venue, publication_date FROM publications INNER JOIN publication_venues ON publications.publication_venue = publication_venues.venue_name WHERE publication_venues.city = 'New York' ORDER BY publication_date;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY author ASC, publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sources;
SELECT title, author FROM sources WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, title FROM sources WHERE publication_venue = 'New York Times';
SELECT * FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT source_id, title, author FROM sources WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author, publication_venue FROM sources WHERE publication_venue = 'New York Times';
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM authors JOIN publication_dates ON authors.author_id = publication_dates.publication_id;
SELECT title, venue_name FROM sources JOIN publication_venues ON sources.publication_venue = publication_venues.venue_name;

SELECT author_name, publication_date, venue_name FROM authors JOIN publication_dates ON authors.author_id = publication_dates.publication_id JOIN publication_venues ON publication_venues.venue_id = publication_dates.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author FROM publications WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT venue FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT author, publication_date, venue FROM publications WHERE author = 'Alice Cooper' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT title, author FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) FROM publications GROUP BY author;
SELECT p.title, a.name FROM publications p JOIN publication_authors pa ON p.id = pa.publication_id JOIN authors a ON pa.author_id = a.id;
SELECT pv.venue_name, COUNT(*) FROM publication_venues pv JOIN publications p ON pv.id = p.venue WHERE p.publication_date > '2020-01-01' GROUP BY pv.venue_name;
